mapper.select: /* selectList */ SELECT id, name, gender, age, address, DATE_FORMAT(reg_datetime ,'%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_datetime, DATE_FORMAT(modified_datetime ,'%Y-%m-%d') AS modified_datetime FROM board ORDER BY reg_datetime
mapper.insert: /* insertList */ INSERT INTO board (NAME, gender, age, address, reg_datetime) VALUES (#{name},#{gender}, #{age}, #{address}, now())
